title: Understanding Load Balancing
name: load-balancing-demystified
description: Explore the world of load balancing with a deep dive into horizontal and vertical scaling. Learn about popular load balancing algorithms, their pros and cons, and when to use each.

title: Microservices Architecture in a single shot
name: microservices-architecture
description: Discover the world of Microservices Architecture: Learn why, when, and how to use it. Explore its advantages, drawbacks, and optimization strategies for efficient, scalable systems.
